categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Brejjan was a male Human private in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire during the Cold War. As of 3643 BBY, he was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock in the Imperial Fleet, where he served the Empire as a vendor and merchant.

Private Brejjan appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Corellia Equipment Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock, though he was later relabeled as the Level 50 Equipment Vendor. He was later removed from the game along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Commendations vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
